contentrichtext.text: [[File:Map of Russia - Kaliningrad Oblast (2008-03).svg|thumb|right|Location of Kaliningrad Oblast in Russia]] [[File:Map of Russia - Kemerovo Oblast (2008-03).svg|thumb|right|Location of Kemerovo Oblast in Russia]] '''Guryevsky District''' is the name of several administrative and municipal districts in [[Russia]]. *[[Guryevsky District, Kaliningrad Oblast]], an administrative<ref name="KaliningradO_adm">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|kgd|adm|law}}</ref> and municipal<ref name="KaliningradOGuryevskyD_mun">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|kgd|mun|list|guryevsky}}</ref> district of [[Kaliningrad Oblast]] *[[Guryevsky District, Kemerovo Oblast]], an administrative<ref name="KemerovoO_adm">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|kem|adm|list}}</ref> and municipal<ref name="KemerovoO_mun">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|kem|mun|list}}</ref> district of [[Kemerovo Oblast]] ==See also== *[[Guryevsky (disambiguation)]] ==References== {{Reflist}} {{SIA|Russian districts}}
